item.description:
Socialize under the Stars
5:30â€“9:30 pm

This summer, kick off your weekends every Friday night at MFA Summer Fridays. Leave your work week behind and relax with friends both old and new. Enjoy live music outside in the Calderwood Courtyard and a specialty cocktail from our cash bars. Open to visitors 21 and older.

This Friday, July 30th is FREE for everyone as part of Community Day.

Please plan to meet in the main lobby of the museum at 5:30 on Friday

More info available at
item.how_to_find_us: Please meet in the main museum lobby at 5:30 pm.
item.name: First Friday at the Museum of Fine Arts
